lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Federal Reserve Board voted unanimously to propose a formula for calculating the risk of interest rate and currency swaps as part of its ongoing effort to come up with a new capital standard for U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Board officials said the new gauge could increase the capital required of the largest money center banks, which are the principal participants in these types of activities.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: However, the staff concluded, "The credit risks inherent in such contracts now constitute a significant element of the risk profiles of some banking organizations."
